name: Mage Robe
description: A lightweight robe worn by mages for protection and style.
looks: The mage robe is made of flowing silk with intricate designs and patterns. It is adorned with shimmering gemstones and has a hood for added mystery.

special_effects.spell_cost_reduction: Reduces mana cost of spells by 10%.

name: Spellbook of Fireball
description: A spellbook containing the powerful fireball spell.
looks: The spellbook has a leather cover with intricate engravings of flames. It emits a faint red glow.

special_weapon_skills.Fire Magic: Increases fire damage and effectiveness of fire spells.

special_effects.area_of_effect: Fireball explodes upon impact, damaging all enemies in a small radius.

name: Staff of Healing
description: A mystical staff infused with healing powers.
looks: The staff is made of a smooth, white wood with intricate designs of blooming flowers and swirling vines. It has a crystal at the top that emits a soft, healing glow.

special_effects.healing_aura: Creates a healing aura around the caster, restoring additional health to allies within range.

name: Enchanted Sword
description: A magical sword imbued with powerful enchantments.
looks: The sword has a shining silver blade with intricate runes etched into its surface. The hilt is made of polished ebony and adorned with a sparkling gemstone.

special_effects.elemental_damage: Adds additional fire damage to attacks

name: Lucky Ring
description: A ring that brings good luck to its wearer.
looks: The ring is made of gold and has a small diamond embedded in the center. It has intricate engravings of four-leaf clovers on the band.

special_effects.fortune: Increases the chance of finding valuable items and improves luck-based outcomes.

name: Chainmail Armor
description: A set of armor made from interlocking metal rings.
looks: The chainmail armor consists of a series of metal rings that are interlocked to form a mesh-like fabric. It covers the wearer from head to toe, providing excellent protection.

name: Staff of Healing
description: A staff infused with healing magic.
looks: The staff is made of polished wood and has a crystal at the top that emits a soft glow.

special_effects.healing_touch: Increases the effectiveness of healing spells.

name: Ring of Wisdom
description: A magical ring that enhances the wisdom of its wearer.
looks: The ring is made of silver with a small, sparkling gemstone embedded in the center.

name: Staff of Healing
description: A magical staff that can be used to heal wounds and restore vitality.
looks: The staff is made of white oak and is adorned with intricate symbols representing healing and rejuvenation. It emanates a soft, soothing light.

special_effects.healing_aura: Creates a healing aura around the staff, restoring health to nearby allies.

name: Ruby Ring
description: A beautiful ring adorned with a large, sparkling ruby.
looks: The ring is made of polished gold with intricate engravings. The centerpiece of the ring is a large ruby that catches the light and sparkles brilliantly.
